languages.text: Приобретать плененных врагов Человечества для каторги — возможный способ восполнения рабочей силы.
Acquiring captives from the enemies of Humanity for use in forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.
languages.original_text: Приобретать плененных врагов Человечества для каторги — возможный способ восполнения рабочей силы.

traits.locale_text: The possession of captive enemies of Humanity for forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.
The possession of captive enemies of Humanity for forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.
Acquiring captives from the enemies of Humanity for use in forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.

Acquiring captives from the enemies of Humanity for use in forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.

languages.text: Capturer des ennemis de l'humanité pour les mettre aux travaux forcés est une solution possible pour reconstituer la main-d'œuvre.
languages.original_text: Acquiring captives from the enemies of Humanity for use in forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.

traits.locale_text: Capturer des ennemis de l'humanité pour les mettre aux travaux forcés est une solution possible pour reconstituer la main-d'œuvre.

languages.text: 人類の敵から強制労働に使用する捕虜を獲得すれば、労働力を補充することができる。
languages.original_text: Acquiring captives from the enemies of Humanity for use in forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.

traits.locale_text: 人類の敵から強制労働に使用する捕虜を獲得すれば、労働力を補充することができる。

languages.text: 将人类之敌抓为俘虏，强迫其参加劳动，这是补充劳动力的可行方法。
languages.original_text: Acquiring captives from the enemies of Humanity for use in forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.

traits.locale_text: 将人类之敌抓为俘虏，强迫其参加劳动，这是补充劳动力的可行方法。

languages.text: Adquirir cautivos a los enemigos de la Humanidad para utilizarlos en trabajos forzados es una forma posible de reponer la mano de obra.
languages.original_text: Acquiring captives from the enemies of Humanity for use in forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.

traits.locale_text: Adquirir cautivos a los enemigos de la Humanidad para utilizarlos en trabajos forzados es una forma posible de reponer la mano de obra.

languages.text: Um die Anzahl an verfügbaren Arbeitskräften zu erhöhen, können Feinde der Menschheit gefangen genommen und zur Zwangsarbeit verpflichtet werden.
languages.original_text: Acquiring captives from the enemies of Humanity for use in forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.

traits.locale_text: Um die Anzahl an verfügbaren Arbeitskräften zu erhöhen, können Feinde der Menschheit gefangen genommen und zur Zwangsarbeit verpflichtet werden.

languages.text: Zorunlu işçilik için İnsanlığın düşmanlarından tutsaklar yakalamak, iş gücünü tazelemek için bir seçenek olabilir.
languages.original_text: Acquiring captives from the enemies of Humanity for use in forced labour is a possible way to replenish the work force.
